name: They Could Not Make Us Martyrs [TECH DEMO]
name_original: They Could Not Make Us Martyrs [TECH DEMO]
description:
They Could Not Make Us Martyrs
[TECH DEMO]

hrule

IMPORTANT: You are viewing the page of the tech demo of They Could Not Make Us Martyrs. This version simply shows the frameworks of the game and is very light on content.

IMPORTANT: This game deal with heavy themes and difficult subject matter.

THIS GAME CONTAINS DEPICTIONS OF DISTURBING CONTENT, INCLUDING MEDICAL NEGLECT, PRESCRIPTION DRUG USE, WAR, TORTURE, AND OTHER KINDS OF PHYSICAL AND EMOTIONAL ABUSE. PLAYER DISCRETION IS STRONGLY ADVISED.

They Could Not Make Us Martyrs is an ordeal-based management game about cryogenically frozen rebels being returned to the front lines after months in enemy prison camps. You will be their protector. Management happens via the Task Operating System (TOS), a now-ancient interface. You are one of the few who know TOS well. Keep them safe!
